p: The Titanium’s blueish-grey color has promoted the use of new aesthetic abutment materials. Many patients, especially those with high esthetic expectations, demand metal-free dentures [ 6, 23], and zirconia and lithium disilicate are the gold standard of aesthetic materials. That’s why we decided to compare one of the gold-standard materials with an interim one (PMMA), and they have a similar cellular behavior according to the results.
